entry.title: Experimenting With Microdata to Satisfy Google
entry.content:
I think Semantic Web has been introduced to us for quite a long time, but we still haven’t seen a practical example before. So, I’m trying to experiment a little bit with my new website that I’ve just created for my friend. It’s Siripachai Agency. Basically, It’s a website for any students that want to study aboard in London. Firstly, I will use microdata on http://www.siripachai.com/abouts first. by following this example. http://www.google.com/support/webmasters/bin/answer.py?answer=146861

And this is the before that I get out of Google search result.

Will upload as soon as google picks up the new microdata that I’ve just uploaded. Hope it works!
